title: Modern Farmer's Miller on Waste of Cold Pressed Juices (Audio)
itunes:title: Modern Farmer's Miller on Waste of Cold Pressed Juices (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Sarah Gray Miller, Editor-in-Chief of Modern Farmer Magazine, on the "dirty secret" of the cold pressed juice industry.
